players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am sorry to hear Diana was killed so early. We need to be very cautious and watch how everyone votes and talks to find the mafia among us."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night."
You: "Charlie is lying about his investigation and I think he might be the mafia because..."
Charlie: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and found the truth. We can't afford to let her deceive us any longer."

Bob: "I believe we should focus on the voting patterns and see if Charlie can provide any proof of his investigation. If he is telling the truth, Alice might be the mafia, but we must be careful not to rush."
